modName: Khajiit Caravan of Setvi - Redone - Skyrim
summary: This mod will add 3 Khajiit brothers next to Riverwood entrance.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url][/size][/b][b][color=#efefef][size=5]

[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/70234-0-1443791239.jpg[/img]
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#efefef][size=5][img]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/img/tes5.png[/img]
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#efefef][size=5]
This mod will add 3 Khajiit brothers next to Riverwood entrance.

You will find:

1 Khajiit warrior, the caravan guard: Amsoud,
2 Khajiit voyagers: Amdul & Amnoud.

Spell, lesser power & ability:

Flames
Healing
Eye of Night - Lesser power
Claws - Ability

Skills & perks:

Light Foot (Sneak)
Shadow Warrior (Sneak)
Purity (Alchemy)
Bullseye (Archery)
Trick Shot (Archery) (Rare!)
Unbreakable (Lockpicking)
Master Locks 100 (Lockpicking)
Paralyzing Strike (One-handed)
Perfect Touch (Pickpocket) (for the 3)
And Fists of Steel for Amsoud only.

Desc & Other:

All are:

Lore-friendly (by the spell, lesser power, ability, skill, perk,Â [b][color=#efefef][size=5]name & background),
[/size][/color][/b]Essential,
Marriageable,
Level to 10 - 81 with the Player Character.
Thanks, Setvi.
The old & unsupported version:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66987/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66987/?

[/url][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#efefef][size=5][img]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/img/tes5.png[/img][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#efefef][size=5]
[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/70234-0-1443791239.jpg[/img]
[/size][/color][/b][/center]
author: Setvi
